column32: Hos Sluktørsten tilbyder vi Tuborg Classic 0,0% til virksomheder. Hurtig levering – markedet bedste pris. Tryk her for at læse mere om Tuborg Classic 0,0% og bestil allerede i dag.

column13: Smooth and creamy nitro stout offers rich, roasted flavors with a velvety texture. Brewed with a balanced and complex grist, it delivers notes of coffee, cocoa, and caramel. Goldings hops provide subtle earthy balance, leading to a smooth, clean finish.

Loris is packed with top quality hops and is juicy as hell, with a soft mouthfeel, great colour and a gentle haze that will turn heads and trigger fomo down the pub. It looks SO GOOD in the glass. It’s a proper craft low alcohol beer.

column2: Below Brew - All Hopped Up IPA
column13: A BIG IPA with flavours of grapefruit, mango and papaya with a piney finish. Citra Lupomax, Citra Dynaboost, Idaho 7 CGX and a splash of Amarillo. 0.5% ABV

column2: Below Brew - Check This Stout - Pastry Stout
column13: This fantastic stout boasts a robust malt base, perfectly complemented by luxurious flavours of chocolate and honeycomb. Every sip delivers a velvety richness, reminiscent of your favourite chocolate bar, conveniently packaged within the confines of a can.

column2: Below Brew - Elephant In The Room - Pale Ale
column13: Below Brew - Elephant In The Room - Pale Ale Subtle notes of coconut & peach intertwine perfectly with our hop variety favourites Sabro & Krush to create this super crushable pale ale.

The classic German hop duo of Tettnanger and Hallertauer Mittelfrüher create a beautiful blend of light floral and herbal aromas in this lager. Below Brew Heaven & Helles, is balanced, smooth, malty sweetness, subtle hop bitterness, and a clean crisp finish.

column2: Below Brew - Wild Juice Chase - DDH Pale Ale
column13: This captivating beverage celebrates nature's bounty and the art of crafting unique flavors. Each sip transports you to lush orchards and sun-drenched vineyards, immersing you in the vibrant essence of wild fruits.

column2: Below Brew Forgot To Take My Pils - Hoppy Pils Lager
column13: Old school hops meet new school drops: Saaz, Perle, Hallertau Blanc & Mandarina Bavaria combine in this wonderfully crisp and refreshing pilsner.

column2: Below Brew The Cosmic Turtle - NEIPA
column13: A delicious NEIPA with a huge amount of Citra, Mosaic, Amarillo and El Dorado hops; a crushable, hazy and tropical hop bomb. This New England IPA has a beautifully pillowy mouthfeel accompanied by a phenomenal fruity aroma and taste.
